attributes.action: include 'Carers Allowance' as a benefit that is disregarded for means-tested benefit purposes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Income Support, pension credit, income-based Jobseekers Allowance, Housing Benefit, and Council Tax Benefit all presently treat Carers Allowance as an income. Carers generally see up to £26.35 each week in recognition of 35 hours of caring for a vulnerable person. In view of the savings that carers make by providing essential care to vulnerable people I ask that the Government recognise the valuable role of carers and treat Carers Allowance in the same way as Disability Living Allowance and disregard it entirely for means-tested benefits.
